nodes.bodyText: Are you sure this is not rather a configuration error? That would mean using InternalErrorException.
InternalErrorException would be definitely better here. This is probably not attribute as we are using it in Perun. It is more like missing information.
What about reworking the exception message as well? I will probablly have hard time to figure out that I have to change the config file after I will find this message in logs.
